rows: Sets the size of the tag.
Sets the variant of the tag.
If true, displays strong tag styles for `"success"`, `"error"`, `"information"`, `"neutral"` and `"brand-05"` variants. Has no effect for other variants.
When true, the tag will be rendered as a button and can be interacted with. When utilized in "icon only" mode, `isInteractive` will always be `false` regardless of the assigned prop value.
For an interactive tag, this applies the disabled attribute to the button and styles it appropriately. For a non-interactive tag, this only applies the disabled styling.

Sets the position of the icon relative to the text. Leading comes before the text and trailing comes after, taking writing direction into account. To use this, you must pass an icon into the icon slot. Can be only used if `isInteractive` is set to true
